episodes.title: Credits: Disciples - The Cult of TB Joshua
episodes.description: This week we cover the the BBC Africa documentary about 'Pastor' TB Joshua. We discuss religion, cults and how such monstrosities were able to be carried out for so long. On a lighter note, we also discuss the new Mean Girls movie, Willy Wonka and the movie releases we’re looking forward to. As always, we mention the documentary we're covering next week at the end!  Link to the documentary: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UZZVQxjXWCg&list=PLajyiGz4JeyNQnWs8QEe-flPqe2xqrQAp&pp=iAQB  Episodes mentioned this week:  08. Sex for Grades https://open.spotify.com/episode/0Ce551qp9c9WoMyKERmZiO?si=nKIGE3_kS9W2v1rGW8YZmQ  https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000470614458  116. A Very British Cult https://open.spotify.com/episode/3VEXuJE1qNHh00YM2naRlK?si=eqaVkB_tTYiMY2iu9u9LUw  https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000613847491  Social media:  tiktok.com/2girls1docpodcast instagram.com/2girls1doc twitter.com/2girls1doc youtube.com/2girls1doc facebook.com/2girls1doc 2girls1doc@gmail.com

episodes.title: 116. A Very British Cult
episodes.description: Want to jump right into the episode? The doc starts at 01:07 Jeff and Simon find themselves intertwined with a group known as Lighthouse. They offer mentorships starting from 10k, they have a charismatic leader and, at some point, they all live in shared accommodation. Sounds like a CULT to us. This week we cover BBC’s A Very British Cult. We discuss stupidity, whether we’d rather lead a cult or be in one, and, somehow, the sex talk. Next week we’re doing a Credits so there’s no trailer this at the end of this ep. However, there’s a bunch of bloopers. Episodes mentioned this week: A Very British Brothel: Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/4f3QomHlDKGCjzaRzNZoyg?si=VY6GNO1ZQ_-oy0YXKcpf_Q Apple podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000468517531 A Very British Sex Shop: Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/3iccBzIBqu9va8tebjOwtU?si=ZDct4i8qQu2ClodhrSpdAQ Apple podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000502645561 Jobfished: Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/3fKIE8kT5bHyfSS9pwmfeL?si=uUX1EFmVTvStzGCmcF0yiw Apple podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000557803556 Tickled: Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/2d11IA3Jn9bomMCLFM5rzq?si=nBtKK2JzRTO_o3eaiYxeqQ Apple podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/2-girls-1-doc/id1498332375?i=1000612916812 Social media: tiktok.com/2girls1docpodcast instagram.com/2girls1doc twitter.com/2girls1doc youtube.com/2girls1doc facebook.com/2girls1doc 2girls1doc@gmail.com
